static_fields.name: Buy Windows Hakose Urushi | Minase Watches | Made in Japan
static_fields.description: Windows Hakose is handmade in Japan. Hakose uses urushi lacquer, paint and metal powder (makie) to decorate the dials.

review.description: The watch is spectacularly beautiful and truly unique.

static_fields.review[0].description: The watch is spectacularly beautiful and truly unique.

hasVariant.name: Windows Hakose Steel - four-seasons
hasVariant.description: Available in stainless steel or in 18K rose gold, the rectangular case of the 7 Windows symbolizes the imperfection of our earthly world, while the round shape of the dial symbolizes perfection, infinity, calm. The 7 sapphire crystal windows reveal the hand-painted urushi dial, viewed through the watch case from a multitude of different angles.
